trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> class encapsulates a node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy that is returned during a search through <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> encapsula um nó ou um objeto na hierarquia do Active Directory Domain Services que é retornada durante uma pesquisa pelo <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> class are very similar to instances of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: Instâncias de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> classe são muito semelhantes às instâncias de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> classe.

trans-unit.source: The crucial difference is that the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class retrieves its information from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy each time a new object is accessed, whereas the data for <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> is already available in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>, where it gets returned from a query that is performed with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> class.
trans-unit.target: A diferença fundamental é que o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> classe recupera as informações da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory sempre que um novo objeto é acessado, enquanto os dados de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> já está disponível na <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>, onde ele obtém retornado de uma consulta que é executada com o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> classe.

trans-unit.source: Only those properties that are specified through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection in your query will be available from <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: Somente as propriedades que são especificadas por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção em sua consulta estarão disponível em <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um novo <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objeto com o caminho desejado e usa o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> método para iniciar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: Depois de executar a pesquisa, o exemplo usa o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> método para recuperar a entrada de diretório ao vivo identificada nos resultados da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que corresponde ao <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> da hierarquia do Active Directory Domain Services.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que corresponde ao <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> when you want to look at the live entry instead of the entry that was returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, or when you want to invoke a method on the object that was returned.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> quando você deseja examinar a entrada ao vivo, em vez da entrada que foi retornada por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, ou quando você deseja invocar um método no objeto que foi retornado.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> on each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> can be slow.
trans-unit.target: Chamando <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> em cada <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> retornado por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> pode ser lenta.

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir é um trecho do exemplo no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.

trans-unit.source: The original example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo original cria um novo <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objeto com o caminho desejado e usa o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> método para iniciar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: Depois de executar a pesquisa, o exemplo usa o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> método para recuperar a entrada de diretório ao vivo que é identificada nos resultados da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o caminho para este <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.

trans-unit.source: The path of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.
trans-unit.target: O caminho deste <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> property uniquely identifies this entry in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> propriedade identifica exclusivamente essa entrada na hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The entry can always be retrieved using this path.
trans-unit.target: A entrada sempre pode ser recuperada usando este caminho.

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir é um trecho do exemplo no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.

trans-unit.source: The original example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo original cria um novo <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objeto com o caminho desejado e usa o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> método para iniciar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: Depois de executar a pesquisa, o exemplo usa o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> método para recuperar a entrada de diretório ao vivo que é identificada nos resultados da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to parse the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> property from the search result.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como analisar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> propriedade do resultado da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> collection of properties for this object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> de propriedades para este objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> of properties set on this object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> de propriedades definidas neste objeto.

trans-unit.source: This collection only contains properties that were explicitly requested through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Esta coleção contém apenas as propriedades que foram solicitadas explicitamente por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir é um trecho do exemplo no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.

trans-unit.source: The original example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo original cria um novo <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objeto com o caminho desejado e usa o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> método para iniciar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: Depois de executar a pesquisa, o exemplo usa o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> método para recuperar a entrada de diretório ao vivo que é identificada nos resultados da pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the search result is put into a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o resultado da pesquisa é colocado em um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Then, each property is displayed to the console window.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, cada propriedade será exibida para a janela do console.
